channel.title: Changing exp rates
channel.description: Im kinda new to this and I'm in the process of making my own server based off of pimpscape and the exp rates are too low for me. How can I change them? plz help

item.title: Changing exp rates
item.dc:creator: @vegies vegies
item.description:
@vegies wrote:

Ok This Is Ranged For Example…

case 2514: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Hmm I Think i missed --- NO I DIDNT MISS!!"); actionName = "range1"; actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(426); addSkillXP((CHANGE THIS*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((100000*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Hope I Helped

-Vegies-

Read full topic
